column1: * 1914 - At the request of Geoffrey Bache Smith
column2: J.R.R. Tolkien addresses Oxford Universitys Sundial Society about the Kalevala and the lack of an English mythology.

column1: * 1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien signs War Office form 22 November 1916
column2: confirming his return to England from France due to trench fever.

column1: * 1950 - Artist David T. Wenzel is born.
* 1954 - Rayner Heppenstall writes Letter to Rayner Heppenstall (1-2 December 1954).
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Stanley-Smith (22 November 1956).
* 1962 - The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is first published in the UK.
* 1962 – A review in The Listener calls The Adventures of Tom Bombadil "close to genius".
* 1963 – J.R.R. Tolkiens friend C.S. Lewis dies.
* 1995 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 7 is published.
* 2005 - Ringers: Lord of the Fans is released.
* 2013  - Lewis and Tolkien: The Lost Road is aired on BBC.
